```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

library(readr)
NBAdata <- read_csv("NBAdata.csv")

```

```{r}
NBAdata %>% 
  mutate(Team=as.character(Team)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=`# Foreign Players`,y=`W/L Ratio`,color=Team))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm,se=FALSE)

NBAdata %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=`# Foreign Players`,y=`W/L Ratio`,color=location))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm,se=FALSE)

NBAdata %>% 
  group_by(Team) %>% 
  mutate(of_de=`Rel ORtg`-`Rel DRtg`) %>% 
  mutate(team_type=if_else(of_de>0,"offense","defense")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=`# Foreign Players`,y=`W/L Ratio`,color=team_type))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm,se=FALSE)
```
